meanings.definition: The quality or state of being formal or ritualistic in behavior or conduct.
meanings.sent1: Her ceremoniousness at the event made everyone feel important.
meanings.sent2: The king's ceremoniousness during the royal banquet impressed the guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ceremoniousness while grooming itself was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The ceremoniousness of the old clock ticking away the seconds felt almost reverent.
meanings.sent5: The ceremoniousness of the graduation ceremony made it a memorable event for all.

meanings.definition: The observance of formalities or ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: The ceremoniousness of the wedding ceremony brought tears to many eyes.
meanings.sent2: The ceremoniousness of the award presentation added a sense of importance to the occasion.
meanings.sent3: The dog's ceremoniousness in greeting guests at the door was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ceremoniousness of the sun setting over the horizon was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The ceremoniousness of the flag-raising ceremony filled the crowd with pride.
